problem_text: If Q R \parallel X Y, X Q = 15, Q Z = 12, and Y R = 20, what is the length of R Z.
compact_text: If QR \parallel XY, XQ = 15, QZ = 12, and YR = 20, what is the length of RZ.
annotat_text: If $\overline{QR} \| \overline{XY}, XQ=15, QZ=12$, and $YR=20$, what is the length of $\overline{RZ}$.
